ids_info.name: barometry
ids_info.description: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL.

barometry/gauge.documentation: Set of gauges. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL.

barometry/gauge/name.documentation: Name of the gauge. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges.

barometry/gauge/type.documentation: Type of the gauge (index = 1: Penning; index = 2: Baratron). Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges.

barometry/gauge/type/name.documentation: Short string identifier. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges. Within type container: Type of the gauge (index = 1: Penning; index = 2: Baratron).

barometry/gauge/type/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges. Within type container: Type of the gauge (index = 1: Penning; index = 2: Baratron).

barometry/gauge/type/description.documentation: Verbose description. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges. Within type container: Type of the gauge (index = 1: Penning; index = 2: Baratron).

barometry/gauge/position.documentation: Position of the measurements. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges.

barometry/gauge/position/r.documentation: Major radius. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges. Within position container: Position of the measurements.

barometry/gauge/position/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges. Within position container: Position of the measurements.

barometry/gauge/position/z.documentation: Height. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges. Within position container: Position of the measurements.

barometry/gauge/pressure.documentation: Pressure. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges.

barometry/gauge/pressure/data.documentation: Data. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges. Within pressure container: Pressure.

barometry/gauge/pressure/time.documentation: Time. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges. Within pressure container: Pressure.

barometry/gauge/calibration_coefficient.documentation: Coefficient used for converting raw signal into absolute pressure. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL. Within gauge container: Set of gauges.

barometry/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between physical information received by the detector and data available on the real-time (RT) network. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL.

barometry/time.documentation: Generic time. Within barometry IDS: Pressure measurements in the vacuum vessel. NB will need to change the type of the pressure node to signal_1d when moving to the new LL.
